title: New: Teddy Au Top – Words
content:
Copenhagen’s Teddy Au Top appears to have ties to quite a few major EU cities, and it’s perhaps unclear as to whether the project is a duo, or simply that of singer Conor Fitzpatrick.

Either way, his/their debut track, Words, is a promising first outing, minimal in a similar vein to someone like George Maple yet hinting at the possibility of branching out into a full on dance track, not too far from Disclosure or Tourist in truth. Check out Words below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
